metadata.title: CVE-2020-9431 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.1, 3.0.0 to 3.0.8, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.14, the LTE RRC dissector could leak memory. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-lte-rrc.c by adjusting certain append operations.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.2-1').
